alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 8:50AM CST until January 26 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Navarro and Henderson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Trinidad. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs along the right bank of the river. Low woodlands for one mile along right bank will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 26.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 33.0 feet. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 33.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
